title: wine_Big_Basin_2013_Homestead_Red_(California)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 39630.
country: US.
description: A fabulous, relatively affordable way to break into this cult winery, this blend of 30% Syrah, 26% Carignane, 22% Grenache, 19% Mourvèdre and 3% Cabernet Sauvignon offers teriyaki, char, fresh fennel, scarlet-red roses, anise, pencil lead and black raspberry on the nose. The sip is lively and action-packed with energetic peppercorn and lavender as well as richer tar, soy, blueberry and blackberry elements..
designation: Homestead.
points: 91.
price: 36.0.
province: California.
region_1: California.
region_2: California Other.
taster_name: Matt Kettmann.
taster_twitter_handle: @mattkettmann.
title: Big Basin 2013 Homestead Red (California).
variety: Rhône-style Red Blend.
winery: Big Basin.
